plot: This video game features live-action squences featuring Bo Hopkins as the international Nuclear Terrorist who is being hunted by the USA, led by General Earle (John Marzilli).
title: Nuclear Strike
plot_es: This video game features live-action squences featuring Bo Hopkins as the international Nuclear Terrorist who is being hunted by the USA, led by General Earle (John Marzilli).
